title: Airwheel Wireless Remote Control Skateboards M3 A Bridge Father and Son
text: Airwheel Wireless Remote Control Skateboards M3 A Bridge Father and Son Patrick Fred is a general manager of a listed company and a father of a 12-year-old boy. He used to be so busy with work that he had no time to accompany his son- Danny. United States, 20 October 2015 -- Patrick Fred is a general manager of a listed company and a father of a 12-year-old boy. Every day he has to leave for work at 8 a.m. and go back home at 10 p.m. He used to be so busy with work that he had no time to accompany his son- Danny. In his heart of hearts, he felt very sorry for Danny. However, an Airwheel wireless remote control skateboard M3 has changed all that. After Patrick sent Danny a M3, they have become closer and closer. One day while Patrick was waiting for the green light, he saw a man and a boy were skateboarding in the roadside park. The little boy was not skillful in skateboarding and kept practicing. The father was holding the remote control and encouraging the boy to slide farther. The boy slid slowly and laughed very jolly. These happy pictures reminded Patrick of his son. They even didn’t have a dinner together in the recent weeks. After Patrick met clients, he went to a store and bought an Airwheel maple electric skateboard M3. The shop assistant told him that the board stickers can be replaceable or DIY. So Patrick drew Danny’s favorite cartoon character- Conan on the board.The special gift gave Danny a pleasant surprise. He stepped on the electric skateboard M3 and began to slide. With the wireless remote control, he could surf on the land freely. What’s more, Danny slides to go to school by Airwheel motorized skateboard M3 every day. Patrick also decides to accompany Danny half day a week. They play M3 together and laughed together. Airwheel skateboards M3 is a bridge father and son. The relationship between Patrick and Danny is getting more intimate. Get more infromations from Airwheel Official Site ! # # #
